notice.ch: IE6005、IE8005、EC5005合班上課。產經所產經組必修，自行上網選課，非產經所與經研所之管院其它系所研究生或外籍生，必須修過統計學，始能選修此課程。

department.ch: 產業經濟研究所碩士班

remark.ch: IE6005、IE8005、EC5005合班上課。產經所產經組必修，自行上網選課，非產經所與經研所之管院其它系所研究生或外籍生，必須修過統計學，始能選修此課程。

goal.ch: “Econometrics is the set of tools by which economists analyze data. The objective of the course is for the student to learn how to estimate economic relationships, test economic theories, and evaluate government and business policy. Some computational problems may be assigned to solve by using statistical software package, such as R and STATA.“
goal.en: “Econometrics is the set of tools by which economists analyze data. The objective of the course is for the student to learn how to estimate economic relationships, test economic theories, and evaluate government and business policy. Some computational problems may be assigned to solve by using statistical software package, such as R and STATA.“

outline.ch:
“1 Simple Regression
2 Multiple Regression
3 Inference for Multiple Regression
4 Dummy Variables in Multiple Regression
5 Further Issues in Multiple Regression
6 Regularization
7 Heteroskedasticity
8 Midterm
9 Time Series Regression I
10 Time Series Regression II
11 Endogeneity and Instrumental Variables Estimation
12 Panel Data
13 Binary Choice Models
14 Censoring, Truncation, and Selection
15 Experiments and Quasi-Experiments
16 Final
17 Self-Directed Learning
18 Self-Directed Learning“
outline.en:
“1 Simple Regression
2 Multiple Regression
3 Inference for Multiple Regression
4 Dummy Variables in Multiple Regression
5 Further Issues in Multiple Regression
6 Regularization
7 Heteroskedasticity
8 Midterm
9 Time Series Regression I
10 Time Series Regression II
11 Endogeneity and Instrumental Variables Estimation
12 Panel Data
13 Binary Choice Models
14 Censoring, Truncation, and Selection
15 Experiments and Quasi-Experiments
16 Final
17 Self-Directed Learning
18 Self-Directed Learning“

textbook.ch: “Introductory Econometrics: A Modern Approach, Jeffrey M. Wooldridge, 7th edition, 2019.“
textbook.en: “Introductory Econometrics: A Modern Approach, Jeffrey M. Wooldridge, 7th edition, 2019.“

gradMethod.ch:
Class Participation (出席率) 5％ 
Paper/Theses Writing (報告/論文) 10％ 
Midterm Test (期中考) 40％ 
Final Test (期末考) 45％“
gradMethod.en:
Class Participation (出席率) 5％ 
Paper/Theses Writing (報告/論文) 10％ 
Midterm Test (期中考) 40％ 
Final Test (期末考) 45％“

ch.competencies: 獨立思考和解決問題能力

ch: 系所:限產業經濟研究所碩士班、產業經濟研究所博士班。
en: Department:Master of Industrial Economics、PhD in Industrial Economics only.
